transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] abhi kuch aaya bhi aaya tha.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ha Shriwari mam, good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Mam mujhe bas itna aap bataiyega jaise hi hum lead purchase karte hain, hai na? Aur uske baad immediately hamare paas option aa jata hai reply karne ka. Ki ye waha se reply kiya gaya hai ya aur kahin se kuch send kiya gaya hai?
Customer: Wahi se, nahi wahi se. So contact buyer now jab hum karte hain, tab contact buyer now karne ke baad we get an option of send reply. So waha se hum once I click on that send reply to pehle ye aisa nahi aata tha. Pehle sirf message jata tha, abhi aa raha hai quotation has been sent. To
Executive: Mujhe, mujhe wahi to mujhe ek bar samajhna padega. Aisa to nahi ki usi page pe koi aisa option raha ho jo tick bhi kar diya ho sath mein aapne. To matlab as such kuch chala gaya ho quotation. Quotation gaya bhi hoga na to aap hi ke profile se jaise 3000 LP FRP storage tank pe might be ek aa raha hoga suggestion ki ispe tick karke dene ka. To agar wo gaya hoga to shayad shayad sath mein jo hai quotation gaya hai. Jo mere taraf se.
Customer: But aise quotation humne configure to hamari profile mein nahi kiya because we don't send quotations like this. Kyunki hum quotation ha. To mujhe ek bar
Executive: Main aapko samajh mein, main batata hu. Dekho quotation ka main aapko option bhi samjhata hu IndiaMART pe. Ek bar na aap us pe jana jaise lead manager pe.
Customer: Hmm, okay.
Executive: Lead manager mein aap gaye, theek hai? Particular koi ek inquiry ya lead open kar lijiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Click kara aapne, theek hai? Usme right side corner mein niche agar aap dekhoge to ek option aata hai quotation bhejne ka. Matlab usme na ek chota sa rupees ka sign bana hai. Right side corner mein ek mic ka option bana hai, attachment ka bana hai aur teesra hai share quotation ka.
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Hai na? Jaise share quotation mein hum click karte hain aur product name man lijiye 3000 LP hum lenge to apne aap na uski jo aapke product hai na usko details yaha pe fetch kar lega.
Customer: Okay, but quotation wo kis basis pe aisa to nahi hona chahiye na? Kyunki agar main uske profile mein jati bhi hu jahan pe unhone send quotation diya. Waha pe I don't see any quotation being sent. Waha pe sirf catalog aur wo jo pehle jaisa reply hota tha waisa hi reply ho raha hai. Right? Waha pe to mujhe quotation bheja hua nahi dikh raha hai usko. The thing is mail pe to nahi ja raha hai quotation that was my question aur second thing is quotation ja jayega kaise we have not configured anything as such. As far as I know I'll check with my team again but I don't think anything is configured.
Executive: Ek ek cheez aur karna. Abki bar jaise hi fir se koi buylead consume karte hain, hai na? Fir jo screen ban ke aayegi bina reply kiye hue pehle screenshot le lena.
Customer: Bina kuch kare?
Executive: Bina koi send reply kare bina pehle screenshot le lena jo bhi screen pe aaya hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Fir usko ek bar check kar lete hain ki usme dikh kya kya raha hai waha pe. To piche waha hai na thoda ek idea lagega. Aur
Customer: Okay. Ye maine kal se hi observe kiya hai. Kal bhi ek bar hua aur aaj bhi hua. Iske pehle nahi hua tha. To I'm not sure kuch hamare side se kuch hua hai.
Executive: Aisa to nahi koi cheez default pe lag gayi ho ab pehle na lagi ho default pe lag gayi jisse quotation bhi usi ke sath kuch send ho ja raha hai. Aisa hota to nahi tha main to main bhi admit kar raha hu.
Customer: Hmm. Aise normal reply hi jata hai. Main then kya exactly unhone change I don't think unhone kuch change kiya hai but I'll confirm and aap bhi apni taraf se ek bar check kar lena jo maine screenshot bheja hai na waisa kis case scenario mein aata hai. Agar aapne check kiya hai na to fir we can check ki humne bhi us waisa kuch kiya hai ya nahi kiya hai ya kuch glitch hai.
Executive: Actually to dekho ye aapke hi account se mujhe actual mein pata lagega. Bas itna kehna hai mera abki bar koi lead jaise hi aap consume karte ho jo screen uske baad ban ke aati hai na usko screenshot bas aap le lena reply kare bina.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai chaliye.
Executive: To thoda ek actual idea lag payega. Waise mam business abhi chal kaisa raha hai aapka? Thoda sa problematic hai jo mujhe abhi idea lag raha hai aapka export mein. Kyunki kuch jo hai complaint bhi humne raise kari hai backend mein Bhumika ne. Shayad ek aad lead aisi bhi thi jisme business mail ID jo humko mili customer ki wo bounce kar rahi thi I think. To uske liye humne na ek concern feedback backend mein raise bhi kar diya already. To ek bar unka reply aa jaye to aur agar matlab exactly nikal jata hai to koshish ye karenge ki aapka lead bhi hum jo hai refund karaye wo wali lead. Koshish to hamari rahegi.
Customer: Ha, wo domestic ke liye hua tha domestic ke liye.
Executive: Domestic ke liye hua tha. Matlab export mein aisa hua hai.
Customer: Nahi domestic mein hua hai aisa. Export mein mera ek hi concern hai ki leads hi nahi hai. To hum matlab leads hai hi nahi aa hi nahi rahi hai. Aaj mujhe ek lead dikh rahi hai 23 hours ago but wo bhi tarpolin tank hai jo hamare scope mein nahi hai. Theek hai? Aur agar agar main past leads bhi dekhu na to past leads mein bhi usme se ek ek aad lead bhi aisi nahi mujhe dikh rahi hai jo hamare scope mein hai. Matlab waha pe FRP word hi nahi hai. In the lead itself FRP word nahi hai, theek hai? To aur third scenario ye ho raha hai ki matlab export ke section mein straight away return ki we don't have any relevant leads aur wo lead hi nahi dikha raha hai. To do teen din tak aisa hua ki do din tak koi leads hi nahi the. Right? Aur to matlab export ke liye it's completely matlab hamara kuch hai hi nahi leads hi nahi hai. Past mein bhi nahi hai aur hume aa hi nahi diye to that was the major concern with export. Aur ye jo hai na mail ID sahi nahi hai wo domestic ka issue hai and second thing is aaj bhi maine check kiya phone numbers bhi wrong hai.
Executive: Phone number bhi wrong hai, theek hai? Ha koi particular
Customer: Phone numbers bhi wrong hai.
Executive: Sorry. Ha nahi theek hai usko bhi check karate hain agar aisa koi hai to phone number to hamara OTP verified ho kar ke hi matlab humko jo hai mobile number kyunki mil rahe hain na most of the cases mein 99% case mein to kahunga bahut rare hi case aisa hota hai jisme mobile number verified na ho.
Customer: So aaj mujhe ek case dikha jo mere team members ne highlight kiya hai aur uske kya aa raha tha waise ki number switch off hai ya
Customer: Number is wrong, number is galat ha.
Executive: Number is galat. Main aapko abhi number bata sakti hu wo kaun sa hai jo wo galat tha.
Executive: Ha mujhe screenshot bhej dena aap uska.
Customer: Ha main screenshot number likh ke bhej dena ya to jaisa bhi sahi lage. To main dekhta hu wo bhi.
Customer: Chalega, chalega. To wo screenshot bhijwa dena mam buylead lene ke baad se kya screen aa rahi hai bas utna hai na?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Main wo kal bhejungii kyunki aaj ke leads maine jitne relevant the le liye.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai koi problem nahi.
Customer: Main kal dekhti hu, theek hai?
Executive: Ji ji, theek hai ji. Okay.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Quotation being sent automatically with reply.

- No leads in export section.

- Mail ID and phone numbers are wrong.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the quotation option on IndiaMART.

- Executive asked to share screenshot of the screen.

- Executive assured to raise concern feedback in backend.

- Executive assured to check phone number issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share screenshot of the screen.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, export, domestic, quotation
